Node.definition: = action by which humans who find themselves in difficult circumstances put their trust in someone else, ► in order to find protection or safety
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to be ashamed|to come to shame|to be put to shame|to be disappointed
Node.definition: = state in which someone has forfeited the respect of the community, due to a situation that is not in accordance to someone's status
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness
= causative action by which humans or deities remove (other) humans or objects from a dangerous or life threatening situation
literally: to bend (one's) ear; hence: = action by which humans or deities make a conscious effort to listen to what (other) humans say
= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used for hearing; also a common place to wear jewelry
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the help of humans in need, whether in military, civil or judicial contexts
figurative extension of a rock as place of refuge: = deity that protects and provides refuge

= large fortification; for the defense of a town; built of stone; could consist of one extra strong building or of a complex of buildings surrounded by its own strong wall; ≈ associated with protection and security and often used as an epithet for God
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the help of humans in need, whether in military, civil or judicial contexts

= area shaped and located in such a way that it is hard to access and can be easily defended against enemies; ◄ this can be a natural stronghold in the mountains (e.g. caves) or a construction erected by humans in populated areas; ≈ often associated with security and sometimes used as an epithet for leaders or deities that are considered providers of security
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
literally: hand; hence: = state of being in a position of control and authority over objects or people

literally: palm of the hand, with the focus on one of the activities that are performed with the hands: to hold someone against that person's will; = condition of being under the malevolent control of another person or group
= causative action by which humans cause hardship to other humans
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse

= state in which humans experience a desire for something to happen, together with a degree of confidence that this desire will be fulfilled through the intervention of someone else; as a result, they are willing to defer taking action for some time
originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of אָדֹון (אָדֹון) = way of addressing God as master and lord
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which humans live with confidence and without fear; ≈ often regarded as carelessness, especially when there is no mention of trust in YHWH
= the period of a person's life between childhood and adulthood

Node.gloss: to be confident|to be encouraged|to rely on|to depend on
Node.definition: = process by which humans receive mental strength as a result of the help provided by others
= front part of the human trunk below the ribs, containing the stomach, bowels, and reproductive organs; ≈ associated with birth, food, speech, and the innermost part of objects

literally = the bowels or inner parts of a human body; sometimes used collectively to refer to all the internal organs and even the whole being, and sometimes used to refer to a specific part of the human body, for example, the stomach, the heart, the womb, the soul, the breast, the genitals; ≈ associated with emotions such as anguish but also compassion
= direct female progenitor; ≈ associated with affection and loyalty; often extended figuratively to refer to other objects that are regarded as feminine
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse
meaning unsure; possibly: = causative action by which someone removes part of a previously integrated unit
= action by which humans express their appreciation, admiration, respect, and/or gratitude to deities about who they are and what they do
= object or event that reminds of something that has happened or as a confirmation of something that is yet to happen
= state in which objects or events are numerous in quantity or frequency
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse
= person in whom one has put one's trust; ◄ because of difficult circumstances; ► in order to find protection or safety
= state in which an object is able to withstand force

Node.gloss: to be filled > to be engaged
Node.definition: literally: to be filled (with an activity); hence: = state in which humans are fully engaged in a certain activity, either as victim or as active participant
= an opening in the lower part of the face of humans and animals through which food and air are taken and vocal sounds are emitted
= state in which humans or deities are considered worthy of praise
literally: all the day; hence: = process by which an event or pattern of events takes place for an extended time, without interruption
= a shorter or longer moment in the passage of time
= state in which a human being is nearing the end of a long life; ≈ and is not able to perform certain functions

Node.gloss: to be finished|to be completed|to come to an end|to be past
Node.definition: = process by which an activity comes to full completion
= state in which humans, animals or deities have the ability to perform actions, or to prevail in, or endure situations that require the exertion or mustering of effort or force
= action by which animals, humans, or deities suspend their commitment to (other) objects, animals, humans, or deities, either temporarily or permanently

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= person who has a conflict with someone else and acts accordingly
= action by which humans or deities carefully observe an object or event for a longer period of time

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= action by which humans come together to exercise their minds as a group to determine how they are going to achieve a particular purpose
= state in which humans or objects are jointly involved in an event

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= action by which animals, humans, or deities suspend their commitment to (other) objects, animals, humans, or deities, either temporarily or permanently

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= causative action by which humans or deities remove (other) humans or objects from a dangerous or life threatening situation
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= action by which humans or deities provide assistance or support to (other) humans (in both military and non military contexts) ► in order to make their life or work or task easier
= action by which someone performs an event quickly

Node.gloss: to be ashamed|to come to shame|to be put to shame|to be disappointed
Node.definition: = state in which someone has forfeited the respect of the community, due to a situation that is not in accordance to someone's status
literally: to finish; hence: = process by which humans and objects completely disappear from existence

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= state in which humans wear a piece of clothing wrapped around their body
= state in which humans feel shame and humiliation, ◄ due to one's own shortcomings or misfortune and/or contempt from other people
= state in which humans experience a feeling of shame, as a result of their own actions or because of what other have done
= state in which humans experience the desire to attain a certain status or condition and do what is needed to make this a reality
= state of hardship or difficulty in a circumstance, sometimes as the consequence of wicked behavior
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
literally: to add; hence: = action by which humans increase the intensity of their engagement in a particular activity
= action by which humans express their appreciation, admiration, respect, and/or gratitude to deities about who they are and what they do
= an opening in the lower part of the face of humans and animals through which food and air are taken and vocal sounds are emitted

Node.gloss: to tell|to recount|to proclaim: to declare
Node.definition: = action by which humans communicate verbally to others about an event or situation, with focus on the contents rather than on the speech act

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness
literally: all the day; hence: = process by which an event or pattern of events takes place for an extended time, without interruption
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the rescue of humans in need
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind
exact meaning unknown; possibly: = the frequency with which an event of a particular kind occurs
= events that require the ability to accomplish great things through characteristics such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof
originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of אָדֹון (אָדֹון) = way of addressing God as master and lord
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= causative action by which humans or deities cause information that is stored in someone else's mind to be reprocessed by speaking about it

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness
= state of being integrated but physically detached from other, similar objects or events
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= causative action by which humans or deities cause humans or animals intentionally or unintentionally to acquire knowledge, skill, or behavior; usually refers to learning to the point of doing
= the period of a person's life between childhood and adulthood
particle linking an event to a point in time; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in time Y

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
particle linking two events; = relation indicating that event X ends at the time of occurrence or completion of event Y
= state in which a human being is nearing the end of a long life; ≈ and is not able to perform certain functions
= action by which animals, humans, or deities suspend their commitment to (other) objects, animals, humans, or deities, either temporarily or permanently
particle linking two events; = relation indicating that event X ends at the time of occurrence or completion of event Y
literally: arm; hence: = the ability to exert strength
= all of the people born and living at about the same time
= the ability to accomplish great things because of characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= state in which an event has a high intensity
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= causative action by which humans or deities cause humans to perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes
= a process by which humans go through extremely difficult circumstances, resulting in severe anxiety, ◄ as if one were confined to a narrow and cramped space from which there is no escape
= state in which objects or events are numerous in quantity or frequency
= state of hardship or difficulty in a circumstance, sometimes as the consequence of wicked behavior

Node.gloss: to keep alive|to restore to life
Node.definition: = to cause an object to become or remain alive and well; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in most cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity

= great body of water located around and under the surface of the earth; when the world was newly created this water used to cover the earth as well; the subterranean water comes up to the surface of the earth through springs

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= causative action by which humans or deities cause (other) humans or objects to go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot or carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle
= state in which a human being or deity has an elevated status, as a result of their authority, rank, wealth, or wisdom
literally: to turn; hence: = action by which deities change their minds about humans

Node.gloss: to comfort|to console|to reassure|to express sympathy|to bring relief
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities seek to make (other) humans feel relief after a time of grief, anxiety, or fear
= marker pointing out that the information that follows represents the logical consequence of what has been stated before
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= action by which humans openly express recognition of what someone else has done or achieved
= human made object of any kind, usually specified by the context, ◄ of various makings ► and made for various purposes
exact meaning unsure; probably: = a soundbox made of wood with strings of animal intestines stretched over the top, parallel to the soundbox
= state in which humans and deities are considered worthy of trust, because they are truthful and committed, with an unwavering disposition, which is reflected in their words and actions
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= action by which one expresses one's respect and gratitude to someone else by uttering words at a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not

= musical instrument consisting of a sound box ◄ made of wood, out of the ends or sides of which projected two arms; the arms supported a crosspiece; strings descended from the crosspiece over the sound box and the number of strings could vary; ► often used to accompany singing

= state in which a deity differs from humans and other deities in that he cannot be associated with anything that is in any way profane or tainted by sin or other impurities, which is a quality that he desires to see in everything else as well

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= action by which one expresses one's respect and gratitude to someone else by uttering words at a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= the fleshy organ in the mouth, used for tasting, licking, swallowing, and (in the case of humans) speaking
literally: all the day; hence: = process by which an event or pattern of events takes place for an extended time, without interruption
= action by which humans utter words with the focus on what is said

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness

Node.gloss: to be ashamed|to come to shame|to be put to shame|to be disappointed
Node.definition: = state in which someone has forfeited the respect of the community, due to a situation that is not in accordance to someone's status
= process by which humans experience a strong emotion of shame
= state in which humans experience the desire to attain a certain status or condition and do what is needed to make this a reality
= state of hardship or difficulty in a circumstance, sometimes as the consequence of wicked behavior
